record.field: Medical care of infants, children, and adolescents
Primary healthcare and general medical care
Chest pain, shortness of breath, fatigue
Heart unable to pump blood effectively
Rest, fluids, and over-the-counter medication for symptoms.
IV diuretics, oxygen therapy. ICU monitoring required.
Continue current medication. Next checkup in 3 months.
Lifestyle modifications, low sodium diet. Start Amlodipine 5mg.
Mild flu symptoms in pediatric patient
Pediatric ibuprofen for fever. Plenty of fluids.
Temporary transfer during Dr. Wilson leave
Referred to neurology for migraine treatment
